Sentencas: (CeO2)(0.8)(Sm2O3)(0.2) (SDC) powders were prepared using the glycine-nitrate process (GNP) with different glycine/metal ratios.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process

Sentencas: The phase identification, morphology and electrical properties of SDC powders were investigated by XRD, TEM and the AC impedance spectroscopy, respectively.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process

Sentencas: It was found that the ratio of glycine/metal had a great effect on both the morphology and the sinterability of the powders as well as the conductivity of the sintered pellets.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process

Sentencas: When the ratio is around the stoichiometric value (about 1.6), the loose powders possessed a foam-like structure.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process

Sentencas: The bulk density of SDC pellets sintered at 1500 degreesC could reach 95% only when the ratio of glycine to metal was in the range of 1.3-2.0.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process

Sentencas: The conductivity increased with the ratio of glycine to metal till at the ratio of 1.7, and then decreased.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process

Sentencas: The maximum conductivity of the sintered specimens was 0.082 Scm(-1) at 800 degreesC. (C) 2002 Elsevier Science B.V.
Titulo: Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process
Sintering and electrical properties of (CeO2)0.8(SM2O3)0.1 powders prepared by glycine-nitrate process
